songs.title: Make Me Wanna Holla
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Big Scoob]
So much drama, I holla, but you don't feel it, notta
[?] much hotter, but you don't feel [?]
Lead my daughters, teach them to lead the squada
I won't bother to holla if you don't feel the nogga
Fuck a holla, bout to make a nigga lose his mind
Grab a mask and a 9, Imma get mine
Try it legal, but legal bring a slow neck
Bounce a quarter after a holder, but a quarter shook the whole treck
IRS at a nigga's neck
Seezing funds till there's nothing left
Disrespectfull kids, hands in they pocket
They wasn't fuckin with me till I opened up the wallet
Had to holla, or whatever pussys call it
Grab my bottle, it's the only way to eas the drama
On the island by my loansom, I don't give a fuck
Type of shit make me wanna throw my hands up

[Chorus: ?]
It make me wanna holla
When they do my life
Make me wanna holla
The way they do my life
This ain't livin
This ain't livin
No no baby
This ain't livin
No no no

[Verse 2: Boogie Man]
It make me wanna holla, throw up my hands
But I gotta be a man
Show no doubt, shoulders back, moving through the job
In the ghetto surviving with a bull throw
I guess this ain't livin
Feell a lot better to be dead or in prison
I'm wishing for better days, so now I pray
Slowly but surely tryna live god's way
But these demans keep on calling me, back, it's hard to shake them
Got me looking for the coward who done it better not take him
Then I think about my mama, come back
Gotta replace him with the thoughts of getting better with god, that's an understaitment

[Chorus: ?]
It make me wanna holla
When they do my life
Make me wanna holla
The way they do my life
This ain't livin
This ain't livin
No no baby
This ain't livin
No no no

[Verse 3: TXX Will]
This ain't livin, this is chacing the dream
Just another crookid plot, another government skeme
Just another way to hold us back like places for them
Then they try to tell us it ain't no racism
Public city schools get no credidation
So the inner city youth get no education
You try to live life, for bright lights
Do a 30 in the dark, don't get caught up in the night
We all up in the system, get robbed by polititions
They take our tax money, and use it all against us
3 police stations and 2 more prisons
And they want more niggas to do more sinning
Got GPS tracking on all of our sellies
America's the beast, and we all in the belly
We got tension at home, and war overseas
Cutting health care means more desese
And then they wanna tell us we in a ressession
And feed us poison medison to treat our depression
I'm feeling like I need more protection
And these fools going the wrong direction
Most people ain't paying attention
Shit I try to tell them, but they still won't listen

[Chorus: ?]
It make me wanna holla
When they do my life
Make me wanna holla
The way they do my life
This ain't livin
This ain't livin
No no baby
This ain't livin
No no no
